overview: Totally perverse and fantastically horny, this is a definite must-see for all of you out there who love hot, young Czech lads making out with their favorite bodily fluids – piss and cum! Baby-faced, but with a definite kink to their personalities, these boys – including porn legends Kamil Fox and Alan Capier, together with newcomer Julien Heath – prove just how much fun being a patient in hospital can be when the doctors are as sexy and deviant as these medics!
title: Doctor Piss
